title: Gomes (Romano de Santa Clara)
body: He is a bachelor of law from the University of Coimbra and a private registrar in the Funchal district. (1921) He represented Madeira in parliament as a deputy in the legislative session from 1895 to 1897. He was born in Funchal on August 12, 1869.

University of Coimbra: Higher education institution in Coimbra, Portugal
Funchal: Capital of the Autonomous Region of Madeira, Portugal

1921: Gomes (Romano de Santa Clara) is a private registrar in the Funchal district.
1895: Gomes (Romano de Santa Clara) represented Madeira in parliament as a deputy.
1897: Gomes (Romano de Santa Clara) represented Madeira in parliament as a deputy.
